definition: male/staminate/grand/imposing/powerful/mighty/person or state having great power and influence

sentences.english: It was like a spirited bronco (semi-wild horse) but it was great.
sentences.chinese: 看上去几象匹雄赳赳的野马，但它很棒。

sentences.english: Not such as summer brings, John, earnest manly bees.
sentences.chinese: 约翰，它可不像夏天里那些辛勤而雄赳赳的蜜蜂。

sentences.english: Fourth Elder Chang, a vigorous looking fellow, has a much large thrush cage.
sentences.chinese: 常四爷雄赳赳的，提着大而高的画眉笼。

definition: head high, chest out (idiom); to keep up one's spirits/in fine mettle (of animal)
striding forward with head high (idiom); to walk with spirited and vigorous step/to strut
arrogant appearance/smug appearance/to act condescending/to put on airs
spirit trembling with excitement (idiom); in high spirits/lively and full of enthusiasm/full of energy/con brio
to have an imposing or impressive appearance/impressive appearance/straight and impressive looking
(of a person) valiant and formidable-looking/to carry oneself tall
